name: TriPoints Consulting
tagline: Cost effective Apps with time to market advantage
description:
The professionals at TriPoints Consulting have provided IT Consulting & Application Development Services to venture capital firms, startups, mid-sized companies, and multi-billion dollar corporations throughout North America & Europe.Â 
With our dedicated Eastern European team of 25+ highly specialized developers and our US based Project Leaders, we provide our Clients with cost effective, agile solutions that provide a substantial time to market advantage.
Founded by a group of consultants from prestigious consulting firms (e.g. McKinsey, IBM, Accenture) with a vision to take the pain out of IT application development projects for its Clients.
Since 2009 TriPoints has completed 200+ projects and more than doubled in size each year simply through "word-of mouth" references and fostering a trust based relationship with its Clients.
